看不见；在视野之外；在看不见的地方

sentences.sentence: This sighting occurred during my dive to a sunken wreck off Sardinia.
sentences.translation: 这次亲眼所见发生在我向撒丁岛外一艘沉船潜水的期间。

sentences.sentence: Ms. Scales recalls her first sighting of a wild seahorse as "like glimpsing a unicorn trotting through my garden".
sentences.translation: 斯盖尔斯女士回忆起自己第一次看到野生海马的情景，就像“瞥见一只独角兽在我的花园里小跑”。

sentences.sentence: A New Jersey black bear that walks upright on its two back legs and has become a social media darling has re-emerged and has been captured on video months after its last sighting.
sentences.translation: 一头用两条后腿直立行走的新泽西州的黑熊已经成为社交媒体的宠儿，距离上次被目击的几个月后，它再次出现并被拍了视频。
